name.str_pl: pairs of fire dragonscale gauntlets

description:
A pair of heavy-duty gauntlets made of fire dragonscale that covers your hands.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

name.str_pl: pairs of fire dragonhide gloves

description:
A pair of gloves made from fire dragonhide. Being made from durable materials make it effective in combat.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (low)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 6. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

name.str: pair of XL fire dragonscale gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of XL fire dragonscale gauntlets

description:
A pair of heavy-duty gauntlets made of fire dragonscale that covers your hands, or whatever you use as hands.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

name.str: pair of XL fire dragonhide gloves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL fire dragonhide gloves

description:
A pair of customized, Kevlar armored leather gloves, modified to be easy to wear while providing maximum protection under extreme conditions.  Sized to fit even the strangest of anatomy.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (low)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 6. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

name.str_pl: pairs of fire dragonscale boots

description:
Boots made of fire dragonhide.  Resistant to fire and physical impacts as well.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

name.str_pl: pairs of XL fire dragonscale boots

description:
Massive boots made of fire dragonscale, modified to fit even the strangest of bodies.  Very protective, and surprisingly light.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (low)</color>:

A helmet made from fire dragonscale, held together with hide of similar material.  It comes equipped with a full face visor.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

A helmet made from fire dragonhide.  It protects your head well, and doesn't cover your face.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (low)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 6. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

A massive helmet made from fire dragonscale, held together with fire dragonhide.  It comes equipped with a full face visor and is large enough to fit even the strangest of heads.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

A massive helmet made from fire dragonhide.  It protects your head well, and doesn't cover your face, but is large enough to fit even the strangest of heads.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (low)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 6. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>

A full suit of fire dragon scale mail.  It comes with all the accoutrements that cover your torso, legs, and arms. Aside from being flexible, it can protect the wearer from raging fire.

This item has the following abilities when worn:

<color_cyan>Fire Resistance (medium)</color>:
<color_white>Decreases fire damage dealt on you by 12. Only affects covered body part(s).</color>
